Improvements.Improvement: Use switch statement instead of multiple if-else statements
Improvements.Description: Replace the if-else statements that check the sketchType with a switch statement for better readability and maintainability.

Improvements.Improvement: Extract common logic into separate methods
Improvements.Change_Diff: Extract the common logic of getting and setting min, max, and items arrays into separate methods for better code organization and reusability.
Improvements.Description: Extract the common logic of getting and setting min, max, and items arrays into separate methods for better code organization and reusability.
Use the System.arraycopy() method instead of manually copying array elements to improve efficiency and reduce the chance of errors.

Improvements.Improvement: Extract memorySpaceMgmt() into a separate method
Improvements.Change_Diff: Extract the memorySpaceMgmt() method out of the main method to improve readability and modularize the code.
Improvements.Description: Extract the memorySpaceMgmt() method out of the main method to improve readability and modularize the code.
